data.title: 1671, Corvinus Van Beldern, Chasseneux, Doujat, Sylloge isagogica iuris canonici, 3 tomes.
data.meta_description:
1671, Corvinus Van Beldern, Chasseneux, Doujat, Sylloge isagogica iuris canonici, 3 tomes.  

Etat : bon état, égratinures et faibles épidermures au premier plat, mors en partie légèrement fendus, manque à la coiffe de tête, faibles rousseurs. Bon exemp
data.text:
Condition : good, scratches and light spotting to first board, hinges partly slightly cracked, loss to head of spine, light foxing. A good copy.

Illustrations : title frontispiece, copper-engraved vignette on the dedication page with the coat of arms of Gabriel Nicolas de la Reynie, wood-engraved headbands, lettering and vignettes.

Binding : contemporary full leather, spine gilt.

Volume : 3 volumes (in 1 volume).

Format : in-12.

Pages : 5 ff, 289, (1) pp, 4 ff; 47, (1) pp; 12, 184 pp, 1 bl. f., 8 pp (Catalogue of books) / A5, A6, A6, B - M12; * - *12; A6, q6, q6, qq6, qqq6, qqq6, qqq6, A - K6, L4, M2, N1, A4.

Publisher : Paris, Gilles Alliot.

Date : 1671.

Rare original edition complete in three parts.

Corvinus' "Jus canonicum strictim per aphorismos explicatum" was first published in 1648.
